titles.title: Quality Cheese Act of 2007
A bill to prohibit products that contain dry ultra-filtered milk products, milk protein concentrate, or casein from being labeled as domestic natural cheese, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1785-1786)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
2/8/2007--Introduced.
Quality Cheese Act of 2007 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to prohibit the Commissioner of the Food and Drug Administration from using federal funds to amend specified regulations to include dry ultra-filtered milk, milk protein concentrate, or casein in the definition of "milk" or "nonfat milk" as specified in the domestic natural standards for cheese and cheese products.
